citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:34 am on
28-Jun-17.
Upon arrival at the facility the front gate was closed and locked. Inspector attempted to contact licensee by phone
and messages left. A business card was left on the front gate. Departed the facility at 12:05 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:34 am on
28-Jun-17.
Upon arrival at the facility the front gate was closed and locked.  Inspector attempted to contact licensee by phone
and messages left.  A business card was left on the front gate.  Departed the facility at 12:05 pm.
